p: Coronaviruses are positive-standard enveloped RNA viruses belonging to the order Nidovirales and family Coronaviridae [ 5]. The first two human coronaviruses, (HCoV-229E) and (HCoV-OC43) were discovered in the mid-1960s. They are the renowned cause of the common cold [ 7].
